definition: the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: The stack of mismatched pens in my house.
sentences.chinese: 我家有一大堆笔套与笔身不配套的笔。

sentences.english: The student twisted the cap off a fountain pen.
sentences.chinese: 那个学生把自来水笔笔套拧开了。

sentences.english: This is the cap of my fountain pen.
sentences.chinese: 那个学生把自来水笔笔套拧开了。

sentences.english: Transparent pen cap with floating Montblanc star. Modern and stylish design.
sentences.chinese: 透明笔套末端悬浮万宝龙星形标志，设计时尚脱俗。

sentences.english: Large towel loop, pen sleeve and glove patch.
sentences.chinese: 大毛巾环，钢笔套和手套补丁。

sentences.english: Supply product: Silica gel cap The Guangzhou good profit rubber Limited company supplies each kind of silica gel cap.
sentences.chinese: 广州良益橡胶有限公司供应各种硅橡胶笔套。

definition: the cap of a pen, pencil, or writing brush
ballpoint pen/also written 圓珠筆|圆珠笔
ability to write/writing skill/written/in written form
felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
the shaft of a pen or writing brush/pen-holder/pen
